method.name: GetRgbKeyboardCapabilities
method.tp:docstring: Retrieve whether or not RGB keyboard is supported for the current device. It can be one of the enum values of rgbkbd::RgbKeyboardCapabilities. See platform2/system_api/dbus/rgbkbd/dbus-constants.h

method.name: SetCapsLockState
method.tp:docstring: When caps lock is enabled, both shift keys are highlighted to a preset caps lock highlight color. If the preset color conflicts with the colors set for the rest of the keys, an alternate highlight color will be chosen. When caps lock is disabled, the shift keys are restored to the previously set background color.

method.name: SetStaticBackgroundColor
method.tp:docstring: Sets the static background RGB color for the keyboard. If CapsLock is enabled, this will not override the Capslock highlight keys. If Capslock is disabled, the Capslock highlight keys will reflect this background color.

method.name: SetRainbowMode
method.tp:docstring: Sets the backlight RGB keys of the keyboard to a rainbow color scheme. If CapsLock is enabled, this will not override the Capslock highlight keys. If Capslock is disabled, the Capslock highlight keys will reflect this background color.

method.name: SetZoneColor
method.tp:docstring: Sets the static background RGB color for the zone. If CapsLock is enabled, this will not override the Capslock highlight keys. If Capslock is disabled, the Capslock highlight keys will reflect this background color.

method.name: SetTestingMode
method.tp:docstring: Used for testing purposes only. If `enable_testing` is true, the Rgbkbd daemon will be configured to a testing mode in which will write Rgbkbd calls to logs. If `enable_testing` is false, the Rgbkbd daemon will be configured to the non-testing mode.

method.name: SetAnimationMode
method.tp:docstring: Sets the animation mode for the RGB keys of the keyboard. This overrides any static colors or special color mode (e.g. rainbow).

signal.name: CapabilityUpdatedForTesting
signal.tp:docstring: Signals that the RGB keyboard capability has been updated. This is only used for tests.
